sentences.sContent: The issue of gays is distinct, therefore, from the almost-as-contentious issue of women in front-line combat roles.
sentences.sContent_eng: The issue of gays is distinct, therefore, from the almost-as-contentious issue of women in front-line combat roles.
sentences.sCn: 因而，同性恋的问题和妇女在前线充当战斗角色这一几乎作为争议的问题是不同的。

sentences.sContent: Cuffs is a fresh, authentic and visceral drama that will take the audience on an exhilarating ride through the challenges of front-line policing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cuffs is a fresh, authentic and visceral drama that will take the audience on an exhilarating ride through the challenges of front-line policing.
sentences.sCn: 袖口是一个新鲜的，真实的和内脏的电视剧，将带观众在一个令人振奋的穿越前线警务工作的挑战。
